title: Your Truth is BS - Part 1
itunes:title: Your Truth is BS - Part 1
itunes:subtitle: Everybody likes to think they're being authentic, but what would you say if Gary told you that "your truth" is bullshit?
description:
Everybody likes to think they're being authentic, but what would you say if Gary told you that "your truth" is bullshit? Well, hot on the heels of the release of Wise as Fu*k, Gary's taking on the grey area that separates concepts like authenticity, personality, and complaints. So, what's really going on in the background of your thoughts? What runs you as a human being? Is your truth really just bullsh*t? Joining the nation today and reveal what's true, including Gary's insights on these questions from your fellow listeners:


  • How can I best cope with feeling like I'm under someone's thumb?
  • Why am I so caught up in labeling my spirituality, and should I even give a shit?
  • How can I deal with my feelings of inadequacy?


All that and more on this episode of Unfuck Nation with Gary John Bishop!


Are You Ready to Unfu*k Yourself for Good?

  1. If you want to be the first to know when we drop new episodes, please take a moment to Follow or Subscribe to Unfuck Nation wherever you listen to your favorite Podcasts.
  2. If you have a question for Gary that you'd like featured on an upcoming episode, you can click here to email him directly or leave us a voicemail on the Unfuck Nation Hotline at (646) 450-3203.
  3. If you'd like to show your support for the show, we would greatly appreciate it if you would share the show with a friend or write a review for the show on Apple Podcasts.
  4. For more of Gary's content, you can click here to visit his website or you can connect with him on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
